content.content: pairwyse1280×720 327 KB  Pairwyse is proposing a solution to provide fixed interest rates on Maker Vaults. Join @Akiva, who posted the initial proposal, on Zoom 2021-10-07T21:00:00Z to learn more about Pairwyse and how it compares and contrasts with the other two proposals for fixed-rate vaults (here and here). The proposal includes the development of a Smart Contract for managing Forward-Rate Agreements (FRA), which create fixed-rate options for borrowers and lenders. Can’t make the call? No problem! Keep your eyes out for the recordings and transcripts on the following channels:  Youtube Podcast Transcripts  Leave your questions below and we’ll see you on the call! @Recognized-Delegates

We wanted to let you know our GitHub pages for Pairwyse are open. We would love the Maker community’s feedback. Please join us for our AMA today on Pairwyse, an extensible fixed-rate blockchain protocol and marketplace for real world asset financing and investment, built atop MakerDAO. When: Thurs Oct 7th, 5pm ET (21:00 UTC) Zoom: Launch Meeting - Zoom Pairwyse Github:   GitHub    GitHub - akiva-capital-holdings/pairwyse-smart-contracts: A smart contract... A smart contract driven protocol for provisioning fixed-rate, fixed-term agreements between borrowers and investors over MakerDAO credit vaults.  - GitHub - akiva-capital-holdings/pairwyse-smart-co...      Pairwyse Solution Architecture:     [Discussion] Pairwyse as a Solution for Fixed-Rates on MakerDAO Integrations       We’d like to share an out-of-box solution for the provision of fixed-rate DAI loans of arbitrary term-length on MakerDAO through application of the Pairwyse protocol built atop Maker’s credit and deposit instruments.   [image]  The Pairwyse protocol specifically solves the impossible trinity for MakerDAO by creating a fixed-rate marketplace for borrowers and lenders without restricting Maker’s use of floating rates and market-driven capital flows to maintain the DAI peg and grow its supply.
